patterns: where is Tiruchendur ?
Where is Tiruchendur Located ?
responses: Tiruchendur is a municipality located in Thoothukudi District, Tamil Nadu, India. It is home to the Arulmigu Subramaniya Swamy Temple.

patterns: How should I reach Tiruchendur ?
What are the possible way to reach Tiruchendur ?
responses: To reach Tiruchendur via Road, Air & Train. Which Type of route to you want ?

patterns: How to reach Tiruchendur via Road ?
Road Route for Tiruchendur
How to reach Thiruchendur by Road ?
responses: Thiruchendur is 34 Kms from Thoothukudi, 58 Kms from Tirunelveli, 115 Kms from Sankarankovil, 129 Kms from Aruppukkottai, 137 Kms from Sivakasi, 148 Kms from Rajapalayam, 180 Kms from Madurai and 217 Kms from Rameshwaram via Tamil Nadu State Road Transport Corporation (TNSRTC) and some private travel services.

patterns: How to reach Tiruchendur via Airline ?
Air Route for Tiruchendur
How to reach Thiruchendur by Airline ?
responses: The nearest Domestic Airport from Thiruchendur is Madurai Airport, Tamil Nadu, roughly three hour drive from Thiruchendur. Madurai Airport is well connected to major cities like Chennai, Delhi, Hyderabad and Mumbai via Spice Jet, Jet Airways and Air India. Nearest Airport : Tuticorin Airports, Tuticorin

patterns: How to reach Tiruchendur via Railway ?
Railyway Route for Tiruchendur
How to reach Thiruchendur by Railway ?
responses: The town has its own Railway Station named as Tiruchendur Railway Station. It is well connected to other cities like Coimbatore, Mysore, and Mumbai via Pearl City Express, Cbe TN Link Express, Tuticorin Express and Nagercoil Express.

patterns: Which Food items are Famous in Tiruchendur ?
List out the famous food items in Tiruchendur
responses: Sillu karupatti(jaggery), Karuppaty, Panakarkandu,Palmyra tuber are the famous food items in Tiruchendur

patterns: What are all the famous hotels in Tiruchendur ?
List out the famous hotels around the temple
responses: Hotel Mani Iyyar, Hotel Ramesh Iyyar, Hotel kavery, Hotel Idhaym, Hotel Saravana Bhavan, Hotel Kaviya .These hotels are famous Near Temple

patterns: Can you Please tell about temple Architeccture ?
What are architecture of Tiruchendur temple ?
responses: Built near the seashore, the temple measures 91 m north to south, 65 m east to west, and has a nine-tier gopuram, or tower gate, which is 157 feet tall. The main entrance faces south, opening onto the first of two prakarams, the first of which is lined with Yalis rows. The temple's inner sanctum is in a cave, and Murugan is the principal deity as a saintly child, portrayed in a granite carving. Naazhi Kinaru, a holy well fed by a freshwater stream, is situated 100 m south of the temple. Upon bathing in the ocean, devotees undergo a ceremonial purification by bathing in water from the well.

which time they will do pooja ?
can you specify the puja time
responses: 5:00 AM : Temple Opening Time, 5:10 AM to 5:30 AM : Subrapadam Thirupalli Eluchi, 5:30 AM to 5:45 AM : Viswaroopam Darshan, 5:45 AM to 6:15 AM : Dwajasthamba Namaskaram, 6:15 AM to 7:00 AM : Udaya Marthanda Abishekam, 7:00 AM to 8:00 AM : Udaya Marthanda Deeparadhanai, 8:00 AM to 8:30 AM : Kalasandhi Pooja, 10:00 AM to 10:30 AM : Kalasha Pooja, 10:30 AM to 11:00 AM : Uchikala Abishekam, 12:00 PM : Uchikala Deeparadhanai, 5:00 PM : Sayaratchai Pooja, 7:15 PM : Arthasama Abishekam, 8:15 PM to 8:30 PM : Arthasama Pooja, 8:30 PM to 8:45 PM : Ekantha Seva, 8:45 PM to 9:00 PM : Ragasia Deeparadhanai, Palliarai Pooja, 9:00 PM : Nadai Thirukappiduthal,Nadai Closed

responses: Kandha Sasti (Soorasamharam), Thai Poosam, Masi Car Festival, Panguni Uthiram, Vaigasi Visagam, Aavani Festival

what are the gods are inside the temple ?

patterns: Can you Please tell about the Kandha Sasti Festival?
which programs are conducted during kandha Sasti festival
which time soorasamharam is celebrated  ?
about the soorasamharam festival
responses: This festival celebrated in 7 days (October to November) . Devotees numbering about five lakhs will participate in the above festival. On this festival occasion, devotees fast for all six days. On the 6th day Surasamharam is demonstrated. On the 7th day Thirukkalyanam to Deivanai is celebrated in a grand manner.

patterns: Can you Please tell about the Masi Car  Festival?
which programs are conducted during Masi car festival
which time Masi car festival is celebrated  ?
responses: The Tiruchendur Brahmotsavam of Masi during February-March each year wherein all the three temple cars are dragged and the festival is conducted for twelve days, concluding with a Teppam or Float Festival, is much esteemed throughout Tamil Nadu.The Pachchai Sattuppadi or the floral decoration of the deity in all green on the eighth morning is especially one which none would wish to miss in the festival.

patterns: Can you Please tell about the Aavani Festival?
which programs are conducted during Aavani festival
which time Aavani Festival is celebrated  ?
responses: Avani Festival is celebrated in August to  September. Devotees numbering about two lakh participate in this festival. On this Avani festival 7th, 8th and 10th day functions are more important. On the 7th, the Sikappu sathi Festival takes place. On 8th, it is the Pachai Sathi Festival and on 10th, there is a Car Festival

patterns: Can you Please tell about the Vaigasi Visagam ?
which programs are conducted during Vaigasi Visagam
which time Vaigasi visagam is celebrated  ?
responses: Vaikasi Visagam is celebrated in May to June. Many devotees participate in the festival. A procession of Sri Jayanthinathar with Valli and Deivanai is conducted in the night.

patterns: Tiruchendur temple construction
who is build Tiruchendur Temple ?
By whom was the Tiruchendur temple build ?
responses: A saint called Mouna Swami re-constructed the temple with three circular compound walls (Prakarams) with black granite stone. It took nearly 72 years for completion of this temple. Three hundred years back the Raja Gopuram was built by Sri Desikamurthy Swami of Tiruvaduthurai Mutt.

responses: Two types Dharsanam avilable in the temple. Civil Dharsanam and Viraivu Dharsanam. Civil Dharsan is free of cost. Viraivu dharsanam amount is 200

patterns: worship process in tiruchendur temple ?
Procedure to dharsan Lord murugan in tiruchendur?
If there any procedure to prey god murugan in tiruchendur ?
responses: First worship at Sivakoluntheeswarar temple(Palaya koil) and then worship at Thoondugai Vinayagar temple(Vidalai Pillaiyar Koil) then bath in sea shore and Naali Kinaru and then enter the temple then worship God Subramanya Swami and Shunmugar ,Jeyanthi nathar and then worship Kodimaram(utprakaram) and worship other deities Such as Saneeswarar, Bhairavar, Valli amman , Devasenai amman, Guru bagavan and come out veli prrakaram worship God Perumal(Vishnu), Soorasamharamoorthy, Kanni vinayagar, Veli kodimaram

Shunmuga Archana
responses: Ticket Cost: Rs.2000,Rs.1500 has to be paid on the Pooja date at the counter for Pooja materials,Total Ticket Cost: Rs.3500 for 6 persons,Ticket includes Archanai and Darshan,Timings: 8:00 am and 5:00 pm, Procedure : To apply this Ticket in Devasdanam office, Valid Photo ID details required at the time of booking the ticket. The devotee must report 3 hours in advance with the ticket printout, One must carry the Valid Photo ID proof at the time of reporting, Tickets can be booked 4 days in advance to 30 days.

Abishekam
responses: Ticket Cost: Rs.1500, Timings: 6:00 am, 7:00 am, 10:00 am, 6:00 pm and 7:00 pm, Abhishekam is performed Daily, No.Of persons allowed: 2, The devotees are allowed to sit in the Sanctum Sanctorum during Abhishekam.  The priest will be performing the Abhishekam with Milk, Curd, Honey, Panchamrutham during this time. Complete pooja runs for 30 mins. Procedure : To apply this Ticket in Devasdanam office, Valid Photo ID details required at the time of booking the ticket. The devotee must report 3 hours in advance with the ticket printout, One must carry the Valid Photo ID proof at the time of reporting, Tickets can be booked 4 days in advance to 30 days

patterns: What are the procedure for getting married in Tiruchendur Temple ?
How to booking a wedding at Tiruchendur Temple?
Instruction For Book Marraige inside the temple
responses: Marriage Cost: Rs.1500, All Puja materials required for the marriage to be carried on their own, Purohit will not be provided by the temple trust, The above-mentioned fees to be paid to the temple, Marriage Duration: 30 to 45 mins, Hall Location: Near Kodisthambham. Marriage Booking procedure: Advance booking required as Marriages are performed on special days,The Groom must be 21 years and above.The Bride must be 18 years and above.Parents/ Relatives must present for the marriage.Aadhaar Cards Photocopies required from Bride, Groom and their parents.

patterns: Can You please tell about the Tiruchendur Temple ?
About Temple Details?
responses: The Tiruchendur Subramanya Swamy Temple is situated in Tiruchendur, and is dedicated to God Subramanya or Skanda. It is one of the six major abodes of God Subramanya and is the only one among the six to be near the sea, as the other five temples are situated on mountains. The town Tiruchendur once had a different puranic name of Jayanthipuram.

patterns: Can You please tell about Nava Tirupathi ?
List out the Nava Tirupathi Temple
responses: Nava Tirupathi Temples are nine different temples situated at nine different locations, all dedicated to Lord Vishnu. All the nine temples are located in Tiruchendur-Tirunelveli route and staying in Tirunelveli or Thoothukudi is the best way to cover the Navathirupathi Temples. The temples are Sri Vaikuntanatha Temple Srivaikundam (Sun) , Thiru Varagunamangai Perumal Temple Naatham (Moon), Thiru Puliangudi Permual Temple Thirupuliyangudi (mercury), Rettai Thirupathi Temples Thirutholavallimangalam (Ragu & Kethu), Sri Mayakoothan Permual Temple Perungulam (saturn/shani), Makara Nedunkuzhai Kannan Temple Thenthiruperai (venus/Sukran), Sri Vaithamanidhi Permual Temple Tirukkolur (Mars/Sevai), Sri Adhinaatha Perumal Temple Alwarthirunagari (Guru)
